verses.verse: On that <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H7121>read<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and therein was <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3789>written,<s%> that an <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> and a <S%H4125>Moabite<s%> should not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H430%H99999>God<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%>

because they <S%H6923>didn't<s%> meet the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H3899>bread<s%> and with <S%H4325>water,<s%> but <S%H7936>hired<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> against <S%H7043>them,<s%> to curse <S%H430>them:<s%> however our God <S%H2015>turned<s%> the <S%H7043>curse<s%> into a <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>
It came to <S%H8085>pass,<s%> when they had heard the <S%H8451>law,<s%> that they <S%H914>separated<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%> all the mixed <S%H6154>multitude.<s%>

Now <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H475>this,<s%> Eliashib the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> who was <S%H5414>appointed<s%> over the <S%H3957>rooms<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> being <S%H7138>allied<s%> to <S%H2900>Tobiah,<s%>

had <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for him a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3957>room,<s%> where <S%H6440>before<s%> they <S%H5414>laid<s%> the meal <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> the <S%H3828>frankincense,<s%> and the <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> of the <S%H1715>grain,<s%> the new <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and the <S%H3323>oil,<s%> which were given by <S%H4687>commandment<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> and the <S%H7778>porters;<s%> and the wave <S%H8641>offerings<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests.<s%>

But in all <S%H3389>this,<s%> I was not at Jerusalem; for in the <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H7970>thirtieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> I <S%H935>went<s%> to the <S%H4428>king:<s%> and <S%H7093>after<s%> certain <S%H3117>days<s%> asked I <S%H7592>leave<s%> of the <S%H4428>king,<s%>

and I <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H995>understood<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H2900>Tobiah,<s%> in <S%H6213>preparing<s%> him a <S%H5393>room<s%> in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

It <S%H3415>grieved<s%> me <S%H3966>severely:<s%> therefore I cast <S%H7993>forth<s%> all the <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H3627>stuff<s%> of <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> out <S%H2351>of<s%> the <S%H3957>room.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>commanded,<s%> and they <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> the <S%H3957>rooms:<s%> and there brought I <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> with the meal <S%H4503>offerings<s%> and the <S%H3828>frankincense.<s%>

I <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that the <S%H4521>portions<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> had not been <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3881>them;<s%> so that the Levites and the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> who <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work,<s%> had <S%H1272>fled<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> to his <S%H7704>field.<s%>

Then I <S%H7378>contended<s%> with the <S%H5461>rulers,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Why is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken?<s%>" I gathered them <S%H6908>together,<s%> and <S%H5975>set<s%> them in their <S%H5977>place.<s%>
Then <S%H935>brought<s%> all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H1715>grain<s%> and the new <S%H8492>wine<s%> and the <S%H3323>oil<s%> to the <S%H214>treasuries.<s%>

I made <S%H686>treasurers<s%> over the <S%H214>treasuries,<s%> <S%H8018>Shelemiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe,<s%> and of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H6305>Pedaiah:<s%> and next to <S%H3027>them<s%> was <S%H2605>Hanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2139>Zaccur,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4983>Mattaniah;<s%> for they were <S%H2803>counted<s%> <S%H539>faithful,<s%> and their business was to <S%H2505>distribute<s%> to their <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H430>me,<s%> my God, concerning <S%H4229>this,<s%> and don't wipe out my <S%H2617>good<s%> deeds that I have <S%H6213>done<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H430>God,<s%> and for its <S%H4929>observances.<s%>

In those <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> I in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> some men <S%H1869>treading<s%> <S%H1660>winepresses<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbath,<s%> and bringing <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H6194>sheaves,<s%> and <S%H6006>loading<s%> <S%H2543>donkeys;<s%> as also <S%H3196>wine,<s%> <S%H6025>grapes,<s%> and <S%H8384>figs,<s%> and all kinds of <S%H4853>burdens,<s%> which they <S%H935>brought<s%> into <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> and I <S%H5749>testified<s%> against them in the <S%H3117>day<s%> in which they <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H6718>food.<s%>

There <S%H3427>lived<s%> men of <S%H6876>Tyre<s%> also <S%H935>therein,<s%> who brought in <S%H1709>fish,<s%> and all kinds of <S%H4377>wares,<s%> and <S%H4376>sold<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Then I <S%H7378>contended<s%> with the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7451>them,<s%> "What evil <S%H1697>thing<s%> is this that you <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day?<s%>

<S%H6213>Didn't<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> do <S%H6213>thus,<s%> and didn't our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> all this <S%H7451>evil<s%> on <S%H5892>us,<s%> and on this city? Yet you <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H2740>wrath<s%> on <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by <S%H2490>profaning<s%> the <S%H7676>Sabbath.<s%>"

It came to pass <S%H8179>that,<s%> when the gates of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> began to be <S%H6751>dark<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7676>Sabbath,<s%> I <S%H559>commanded<s%> that the <S%H1817>doors<s%> should be <S%H5462>shut,<s%> and <S%H559>commanded<s%> that they should not be <S%H6605>opened<s%> until <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H7676>Sabbath.<s%> I <S%H5975>set<s%> some of my <S%H5288>servants<s%> over the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> that no <S%H4853>burden<s%> should be brought <S%H935>in<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
So the <S%H7402>merchants<s%> and <S%H4376>sellers<s%> of all kinds of <S%H4465>wares<s%> <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H6471>once<s%> or <S%H8147>twice.<s%>

Then I <S%H5749>testified<s%> against <S%H559>them,<s%> and said to <S%H3885>them,<s%> "Why do you stay <S%H5048>around<s%> the <S%H2346>wall?<s%> If you do so <S%H8138>again,<s%> I will <S%H7971>lay<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> on <S%H6256>you.<s%>" From that time <S%H935>on,<s%> they didn't come on the <S%H7676>Sabbath.<s%>

I <S%H559>commanded<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that they should <S%H2891>purify<s%> <S%H935>themselves,<s%> and that they should come and <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> <S%H2142>Remember<s%> to <S%H430>me,<s%> my God, this <S%H2347>also,<s%> and spare me according to the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of your loving <S%H2617>kindness.<s%>
In those <S%H3117>days<s%> also <S%H7200>saw<s%> I the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who had <S%H3427>married<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> of <S%H796>Ashdod,<s%> of <S%H5984>Ammon,<s%> and of <S%H4125>Moab:<s%>

and their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> in the speech of <S%H797>Ashdod,<s%> and <S%H5234>could<s%> not <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H3066>Jews<s%>' language, but according to the <S%H3956>language<s%> of <S%H5971>each<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

I <S%H7378>contended<s%> with <S%H7043>them,<s%> and cursed <S%H5221>them,<s%> and struck <S%H582>certain<s%> of <S%H4803>them,<s%> and plucked off their hair, and made them <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H430>God,<s%> "You shall not <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> nor <S%H5375>take<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> for your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> or for yourselves.

<S%H8010>Didn't<s%> Solomon <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> by these <S%H7227>things?<s%> Yet among many <S%H1471>nations<s%> was there no <S%H4428>king<s%> like <S%H157>him,<s%> and he was beloved of his <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Nevertheless <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> caused even <S%H1571>him<s%> to <S%H2398>sin.<s%>

Shall we then <S%H8085>listen<s%> to you to <S%H6213>do<s%> all this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> to <S%H4603>trespass<s%> against our <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3427>marrying<s%> <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H802>women?<s%>"

One of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3111>Joiada,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> was <S%H2860>son-in<s%>-law to <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> the <S%H2772>Horonite:<s%> therefore I chased him from <S%H1272>me.<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H430>them,<s%> my God, because they have <S%H1352>defiled<s%> the <S%H3550>priesthood,<s%> and the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3550>priesthood,<s%> and of the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>

Thus I <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> them from all <S%H5236>foreigners,<s%> and <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H4931>duties<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and for the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> in his <S%H4399>work;<s%>

and for the <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H7133>offering,<s%> at <S%H6256>times<s%> <S%H2163>appointed,<s%> and for the first <S%H1061>fruits.<s%> <S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H430>me,<s%> my God, for <S%H2896>good.<s%>
